entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
